channel.title: A few questions for advanced coders
channel.description:
[size=15pt]A few questions for advanced coders...[/size]
1: Bow Damage [s]OK, when I equip full torag with a C Bow, I hit 40's and 50s. When I equip good ranger gear, I can only do up to 20. When I equip ranger gear, it has higher range attack bonus and still, I do very little compared to full torags (and any other strong melee armour). How can I solve this?[/s]
2: Port-forwarding I did everything I need in order to port-forward. Still, nobody can log into my server. I set the variables. I added port to firewall exceptions. How can I solve it?
3: Arrow Gfx I did Palidino76's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128498.0.html]Range Projectiles[/url] for the arrow animation of normal bows and Crystal Bow. He made it so when I attack an NPC or a player, the arrow goes towards them. Read his tutorial first, and you'll know what I'm talking about in this question. When I attack an NPC, the arrow goes straight at it. When I attack a player, nothing happens, no gfx. I did his whole tutorial, and the gfx for arrows on players didn't work. Does anybody know why?
4: Anti-lag I assume that you've heard of ZdiddyScape? Around a month ago, there was a poll on which server was the best. ZdiddyScape was ranked 1. That server, and all the other popular servers have a special anti-lag code. Whenever I mass click on training objects, such as dummies, on their server, it doesn't lag. My server lags when I do hat. What's the code or link to a tutorial that solves this problem? I already have actionTimer in my training cases.

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

KK, still it lags when I mass click on NPCs though (and when I mass click on players, it doesn’t hit faster but it lags).

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Don’t add objects for training :P.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

KK, I’ll have a look at that tutorial soon. I already have a DUC, I turn it on before I run my server. Nobody can connect through No-IP or Hamachi.

Well it’s not that kind of lag that you’re thinking of. I have 1GB ram. It’s when I mass click it lags, uhh like when I try to move somewhere else while mass clicking on dummies it doesn’t move and sometimes says “connection lost”.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

The bow damage with barrows is just a bug. I’ll give you link to wooker’s tut on how to fix it in a second. The anti-lag is how good your computer is, when thief hosted my server with a deticated server for about 2 days it didn’t lag at all.

K here’s link on how to fix the bow damage.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Go to www.no-ip.com and download a No-IP DUC, and it’ll update the hosts you have, just click on the box of the one that you want up, and it should work.

To get to the No-IP DUC, go to the top, and click on Downloads. Lol.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

There isn't any code. If you want your server to be lag free, [b]learn to code, and don't just C&P[/b].

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[quote=".Kaboom, post:3, topic:112795"][size=15pt]A few questions for advanced coders…[/size]

1: Bow Damage
OK, when I equip full torag with a C Bow, I hit 40’s and 50s. When I equip good ranger gear, I can only do up to 20. When I equip ranger gear, it has higher range attack bonus and still, I do very little compared to full torags (and any other strong melee armour). How can I solve this?

Check item.cfg, Make sure torags range bonuses arnt high. vise versa

2: Port-forwarding
I did everything I need in order to port-forward. Still, nobody can log into my server. I set the variables. I added port to firewall exceptions. How can I solve it?

Make sure you have a router, and have NO-ip DUC. If your using Hamachi tell them to join onto your network.

3: Arrow Gfx
I did Palidino76’s Range Projectiles for the arrow animation of normal bows and Crystal Bow. He made it so when I attack an NPC or a player, the arrow goes towards them. Read his tutorial first, and you’ll know what I’m talking about in this question. When I attack an NPC, the arrow goes straight at it. When I attack a player, nothing happens, no gfx. I did his whole tutorial, and the gfx for arrows on players didn’t work. Does anybody know why?

I think he added an antiLeach on that TuT. You should learn how to code before C’in & P’in

4: Anti-lag
I assume that you’ve heard of ZdiddyScape? Around a month ago, there was a poll on which server was the best. ZdiddyScape was ranked 1. That server, and all the other popular servers have a special anti-lag code. Whenever I mass click on training objects, such as dummies, on their server, it doesn’t lag. My server lags when I do hat. What’s the code or link to a tutorial that solves this problem? I already have actionTimer in my training cases.

There isn’t any code. If you want your server to be lag free, learn to code, and don’t just C&P.[/quote]

I told you… My torags range bonuses aren’t high. I have a router, otherwise I can’t porforward -_- Sorry, I’m not an experienced coder, I only know the basics. I haven’t C&P a lag free code before, I can’t even find a tutorial.

1. Maybe your range goes off of your strength bonus? 2. www.portforward.com 3. Dont know.. 4. Theres a tut go look for it i saw it a few days ago.

Maybe it goes off my strength bonus hmm, well how do I set it to range bonus? I told you, I have port forwarded, I’ve already been to that site and followed the instructions. Can you please post the link to the lag fre tutorial? I can’t find any… I’ve searched…

EDIT: I’m going to shower BRB.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions for advanced coders

item.title: A few questions for advanced coders
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

[size=15pt]A few questions for advanced coders…[/size]

1: Bow Damage OK, when I equip full torag with a C Bow, I hit 40's and 50s. When I equip good ranger gear, I can only do up to 20. When I equip ranger gear, it has higher range attack bonus and still, I do very little compared to full torags (and any other strong melee armour). How can I solve this?
Check item.cfg, Make sure torags range bonuses arnt high. vise versa
2: Port-forwarding I did everything I need in order to port-forward. Still, nobody can log into my server. I set the variables. I added port to firewall exceptions. How can I solve it?
Make sure you have a router, and have NO-ip DUC. If your using Hamachi tell them to join onto your network.
3: Arrow Gfx I did Palidino76's [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128498.0.html]Range Projectiles[/url] for the arrow animation of normal bows and Crystal Bow. He made it so when I attack an NPC or a player, the arrow goes towards them. Read his tutorial first, and you'll know what I'm talking about in this question. When I attack an NPC, the arrow goes straight at it. When I attack a player, nothing happens, no gfx. I did his whole tutorial, and the gfx for arrows on players didn't work. Does anybody know why?
I think he added an antiLeach on that TuT. You should learn how to code before C'in & P'in
4: Anti-lag I assume that you've heard of ZdiddyScape? Around a month ago, there was a poll on which server was the best. ZdiddyScape was ranked 1. That server, and all the other popular servers have a special anti-lag code. Whenever I mass click on training objects, such as dummies, on their server, it doesn't lag. My server lags when I do hat. What's the code or link to a tutorial that solves this problem? I already have actionTimer in my training cases.
There isn't any code. If you want your server to be lag free, learn to code, and don't just C&P.

Read full topic
